content: a fun little hat for a preemie baby or newborn 4 sizes ~ small preemie medium preemie large preemie / small newborn and 0 - 3 months requires ~ dk yarn and 4mm needles bigger sizes are available on this link ~ https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/pumpkin-hats-4 so cute **to get this free pattern please click on the https link just below ↓**
